name: area code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the area within the plant

name: area name
definition: A name describing the location of an area within the plant

name: site code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the site

name: site name
definition: A unique name to identify a geographical location

name: plant code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the plant

name: plant name
definition: The full name of the plant

name: process unit name
definition: A name describing the function of the process unit

name: commissioning unit code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the commissioning unit within a plant

name: commissioning unit name
definition: The name by which the commission unit is usually designated

name: maintenance unit code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the maintenance unit at a plant

name: maintenance unit name
definition: The name by which the maintenance unit is usually designated

name: maintenance system code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the maintenance system within a maintenance unit

name: maintenance system name
definition: The name by which the maintenance system is usually designated

name: maintenance system actual startup date
definition: The date at which the maintenance system has been started for the first time (on a continuous basis)
note / comment: This information is used by the maintenance discipline to develop maintenance plans, and particularly to determine when the first maintenance activities will have to happen.

name: corrosion loop code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the corrosion loop at a plant

name: corrosion loop name
definition: The name by which the corrosion loop is usually designated

name: corrosion loop description
definition: A description of what the corrosion loop is
example: Example : V301 separator vessel below demister. Condensate liquid outlet piping to BL.

name: corrosion loop process description
definition: A description of the process performed by the elements of the corrosion loop
example: Example : V301 separates the 15 barg gas stream into dry saturated gas and condensate containing hydrocarbons, free sour water (CO2 and H2S) and inhibitor.

name: corrosion type description
definition: A description of the expected effects of the corrosion
example: Example : Vessel is made of 15mm PWHT carbon steel including 3mm corrosion allowance.Normal operation Wet CO2 corrosion.Special operating conditions Un-inhibited the corrosion rate is 1.1mm/yr. Inhibiter injection should be monitored and alarmed.

name: corrosion loop type code
definition: The type of corrosion loop that classifies this corrosion loop

name: corrosion loop type name
definition: The name by which the corrosion loop type is usually designated

name: tag status
definition: An identification of the engineering phase in which the tag is

name: tag requisition number
definition: A requisition number that has been placed to acquire the tag

name: production critical item indicator
definition: An indication whether the loss of the functionality provided by the tag would have an immediate cost impact, like a loss of production

name: safety critical item indicator
definition: An indication whether the tag should be considered as a safety critical element, as per International Standards
note / comment: Safety Critical Elementa (SCEs) are those elements of risk barriers, including equipment, hardware, and related control systems, for which :- the failure of which could lead to a major accident or event, or - that mitigate the consequences of a major accident or event. The basis for the selection of SCEs is the assessment of Major Accidents identified in each Asset HSE Case or those documents that support the Case.

name: safety critical item group code
definition: A code, as per SDE standards, that uniquely identifies the safety item group

name: safety critical item reason awarded
definition: A documentation of the outcome of the SCE assessment
note / comment: This is only required if safety critical item indicator =Yes.  It is populated according to International Standard.

name: equipment code
definition: A code used to identify uniquely the equipment.
note / comment: The number is sometimes generated by the company maintenance management system. Different companies use different naming conventions for their equipment code, like e.g. Equip_<plant_code>_<tag_name>, where plant_code/tag_name represent where the equipment is installed.

name: equipment actual purchase date
definition: The date at which the equipment was actually purchased

name: equipment actual startup date
definition: The date at which the equipment was actually started up

name: equipment warranty end date
definition: The date at which the warrant on the equipment will end
note / comment: This date is usually supplied by the manufacturer.

name: manufacturer indicator
definition: An indicator whether the company is a manufacturer or not

name: supplier indicator
definition: An indicator whether the company is a supplier or not

name: company contact person
definition: The name of the person to contact in the company

name: company contact person function
definition: A description of the role of the contact person within the organization of the company.

name: tag class name
definition: The full name of the tag or equipment class

name: abstract class indicator
definition: An indication whether the tag or equipment class is an aggregation of other tag or equipment classes and should not be used for associating properties

name: equipment expected to be installed indicator
definition: An indication whether equipment are expected to be installed for tags that are associated with this tag class
note / comment: This is redundant with the tag class and equipment class relationship : the absence of that relationship would mean no equipment is expected to be installed.NO would be used when soft tags, civil tags (e.g. roads), ...

name: equipment class name
definition: The full name of the tag or equipment class

name: source standard code
definition: A code used to designate the standard used to define requirements like engineering, operations, etc

name: spare part information required indicator
definition: An indication whether spare part information is required for equipment related to this class or not

name: property name
definition: A name that uniquely identifies the property

name: property existence reason description
definition: The reason why the property has been added in CFIHOS

name: property picklist name
definition: The name by which the pick list is designated

name: property picklist value code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies an entry in a pick list

name: document review type code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies a document review type

name: forecast review date
definition: The latest forecast date at which the document is expected to be issued for review
note / comment: The first issuance of the Document_Master will be the baseline plan.

name: actual review date
definition: The date on which the document revision  was actually reviewed

name: forecast approval date
definition: The latest forecast date at which the document is expected to be issued for approval
note / comment: The first issuance of the Document_Master will be the baseline plan.

name: actual approval date
definition: The date at which the document revision has been issued for approval

name: forecast approved for design date
definition: The latest forecast date at which the document is expected to be issued approved for design
note / comment: The first issuance of the Document_Master will be the baseline plan.

name: actual approved for design date
definition: The date at which the document revision has been issued approved for design

name: forecast approved for construction date
definition: The latest forecast date at which the document is expected to be issued approved for construction
note / comment: The first issuance of the Document_Master will be the baseline plan.

name: actual approved for construction date
definition: The date at which the document revision has been issued approved for construction

name: forecast as built date
definition: The latest forecast date at which the document is expected to be issued as-built
note / comment: The first issuance of the Document_Master will be the baseline plan.

name: actual as built date
definition: The date at which the document revision has been issued as-built

name: discipline name
definition: The name by which the discipline is designated

name: document revision date
definition: The date the document was revised

name: originator company
definition: The name of the company who has generated the document revision

name: document revision author
definition: The name of the person who created the document revision
note / comment: This should be an individual name, not a role, i.e. Initials and last name, not just initials

name: document revision approver
definition: The name (or the User ID) of the person who has approved the document revision

name: document revision file name
definition: The name of the electronic file (including the file extension) with the full path
note / comment: The file name shall consist of the document number, Document revision and a sequence number followed by the file extension.When this attribute is populated the attribute physical storage location shall be left empty.

name: originator document revision code
definition: A code used to identify the content of a document at a certain point in time according to the  originator which doesn't necessarily conform to the Owner/Operator's document revision coding scheme
note / comment: One potential use is to allow Owner/Operator to identify duplicate documents provided by multiple subcontractors but from the same OEM.

name: originator file name
definition: The name of the file as provided by the manufacturer
note / comment: Remark: One potential use is to allow Owner/Operator to identify duplicate documents provided by multiple subcontractors but from the same OEM. This document shall not contain any project specific cover page, but only the manufacturer cover page.

name: document status code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the status of document revisions
note / comment: A document is classified by a single state, which changes as the document advances through this lifecycle.

name: project name
definition: A unique name used to identify the project

name: document revision comment
definition: Any additional comment / explanation for a document revision
example: Example : Does not include package A-1001

name: export control classification code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies an export control classification

name: transmittal number
definition: The transmittal through which this document revision was communicated

name: document revision recipient
definition: The full name of the recipient of the document. revision

name: document revision physical storage location
definition: The location of a media when not stored as an electronic file
example: When this field is populated the attribute file name shall be left empty,Example : Box1523

name: storage media code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the storage media

name: project stage code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the stage of projects

name: tag number format
definition: An expression that represents the format of the tags belonging to the tag class
note / comment: This allows companies to have specific tag formats

name: document type short code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies a document type

name: asset type code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the type of asset

name: required for conceptual design
definition: An indication whether the document type is required during the CONCEPTUAL DESIGN phase (Select)

name: required for project specification
definition: An indication whether the document type is required during the project SPECIFICATION phase (Define)

name: required for detailed design
definition: An indication whether the document type is required during the DETAILED DESIGN phase (Execute)

name: required handover status
definition: The required status of the document at handover time

name: required for commissioning
definition: An indication whether the document type is required during the COMMISSIONING phase

name: required for startup
definition: An indication whether the document type is required during STARTUP phase

name: required for offshore
definition: An indication whether this Document Type is required for Off- Shore facilities

name: required for onshore
definition: An indication whether this Document Type is required for On- Shore facilities

name: documentation representation type code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the document representation type

name: during project transmittal format
definition: The electronic format of the document in transmittals, during the project

name: after project electronic transmittal format
definition: The electronic format of the document in transmittals, after the project

name: discipline document type comment
definition: A comment about this discipline and document type

name: hardcopy document required
definition: An indicator which specifies if documents classified with this document type require a paper hardcopy. during project and/or after project

name: translated document required
definition: An indicator which specifies if documents classified with this document type have to be translated in another language. during project and/or after project.

name: file title
definition: A description in a short and concise manner of the content of the additional file
note / comment: This is not meant to repeat the document title. The FILE_TITLE shall be unique within a particular document revision. Refer to the chapter Set of Files for more information.
example: Example : PEFS Crude Oil Booster Pumps (Native)

name: file name
definition: The unique name of the electronic file (including its extension)

name: purchase order number
definition: The purchase order number that contains all specifications for the tag
note / comment: This information is captured to ensure that the original design for a Tag (usually copied into the purchase order) can be found back, in case of lost of Tag design information (e.g. data-sheet).

name: number of media
definition: The number of media provided with the transmittal

name: construction assembly code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the construction assembly at a plant

name: construction assembly name
definition: A name describing the purpose of a construction assembly

name: property definition
definition: A definition of what the property represents
example: Example : The pressure at which a functional or physical object is expected to operate normally.

name: purchase order date
definition: The date the purchase order is issued

name: reason for issue code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the reason for issue

name: transmittal send date
definition: The date of sending the transmittal

name: CFIHOS unique code
definition: A unique identifier, assigned in the CFIHOS Reference Data Library (RDL) to the tag or equipment class
note / comment: CFIHOS unique code are unique across all types of objects in CFIHOS RDLThe initial set of values will be the CFIHOS unique ids that were assigned to tagclasses

name: ISO language code
definition: The language that should be used by default for all exchange of information related to that plant

name: document type name
definition: The name by which the document type is designated

name: company address line 1
definition: The first line of the address of the company
example: Example ; 6, Water side Business Park Eastways

name: company name
definition: A name used to uniquely identify the company
note / comment: It is sometimes extracted from maintenance management system.The owner / operator and the EPC company need to align on the name of companies.

name: ISO country code
definition: The country where the company address is located

name: property picklist value description
definition: A description of what the entry in the pick list represents

name: discipline code
definition: A code that  uniquely identifies a discipline

name: document number
definition: The unique identifier for the Document according to the Owner/Operator Document numbering scheme

name: company email address
definition: The official email address of the company

name: company fax number
definition: The official fax number of the company

name: process unit code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the process unit within the plant

name: manufacturer company name
definition: A name used to uniquely identify the company who manufactures the model / part

name: model part name
definition: A unique name to identify the model part of the manufacturer
note / comment: If the manufacturer creates a new generation of an existing model that affects the properties of it, and if the manufacturer does not change its model part name, then it should be suffixed here with the model date, to enable the capture of the new properties of the new model generation.

name: originator document number
definition: The unique identifier for the Document according to the originator document numbering scheme
note / comment: One potential use is to allow Owner/Operator to identify duplicate documents provided by multiple subcontractors but from the same OEM.

name: project code
definition: The code that identifies the project the document revision refers to

name: document revision code
definition: A code used to identify the content of a document at a certain point in time
note / comment: It is used to track the evolution of a document during its lifecycle and is applied at time of release from Originator to reflect the document is frozen.

name: equipment manufacturer serial number
definition: A unique identification number for the equipment as prescribed by the manufacturer
note / comment: If the equipment is a custom item designed specifically for this project, the contractor shall likewise assign a unique serial number. During the project this field may not be provided as the equipment is not received.

name: vendor company name
definition: The name of the company supplying (vendor) the equipment

name: purchase order receiver company name
definition: The name of the company that receives the purchase order

name: tag name
definition: The full name of a tag
note / comment: Different companies have different tag naming conventions. A tag name shall be unique within a plant.

name: company telephone number
definition: The official telephone number of the company

name: document title
definition: A description, in a short and concise manner, of the content of the document
note / comment: The title of the document usually appears on the front page of the document or in title block.
example: Example : Laydown Area & Pipe Rack North / South

name: equipment actual installation date
definition: The date at which the equipment was actually installed

name: equipment price
definition: The price of the equipment for accounting, excluding freight, shipping and insurance costs
note / comment: When provided the price must be qualified by a currency

name: data type code
definition: An indication what are the type of values a data element can take

name: SI unit of measure code
definition: The SI (metric) unit of measure recommended for the property of this tag or equipment class

name: imperial unit of measure code
definition: The Imperial unit of measure recommended for the property of this tag or equipment class

name: parent construction assembly code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the parent of a construction assembly at a plant

name: parent commissioning unit code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the parent of the commission unit at the plant

name: tag description
definition: A functional description of the tag
note / comment: The description can also include the parent tag, where required.  It should not include tag class, manufacturer and model information.
example: Good Examples : - Hot Oil Circulation Pump that clearly describes the function of the pump (the equipment assigned can be centrifugal or reciprocating pump).  - V 431 Separator Relief Valve that clearly describes the function of the valve, with ad

name: parent tag name
definition: An identification of the parentage of the tag
note / comment: The parent tag (also called main tag) can be a package, an instrument loop or an electrical circuit.

name: designed by company name
definition: The company responsible for the design of the tag

name: purchase order issuer company name
definition: The name of the company issuing the purchase order for the acquisition of the tag

name: from plant code
definition: The plant the process unit is part of, and to which the originating tag belongs

name: from tag name
definition: The full name of a tag

name: to plant code
definition: The plant the process unit is part of, and to which the ending tag belongs

name: to tag name
definition: The full name of a tag

name: company address line 2
definition: The second line of the address of the company

name: company address line 3
definition: The third line of the address of the company

name: purchase order description
definition: A description of what is being purchased

name: ISO country name
definition: The name assigned by ISO to the country, in its 3166-1 standard
example: Examples : United States, France, United Kingdom

name: engineering status code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies an engineering phase or status

name: engineering status description
definition: The description of what the engineering status or phase represents

name: safety critical item group description
definition: A description of what the safety critical item group represents

name: model part description
definition: A description of the main function of the model part

name: ISO currency code
definition: The currency in which the price of the equipment is labelled.

name: ISO currency name
definition: The name that is assigned to the ISO currency

name: regulatory required indicator
definition: An indication whether this document is to be developed to meet regulatory compliance requirements

name: document status description
definition: The description of what the document status represents

name: ISO language name
definition: The name that ISO assigns to a language, in its ISO639-1 standard

name: export control classification description
definition: A description of what the export control classification represents

name: project stage name
definition: The name of the project stage

name: reason for issue description
definition: A description of what the reason for issue represents

name: coding source code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the system that has been assigning codes to objects relevant to CFIHOS

name: CFIHOS coding equivalent source description
definition: A description of what that coding source is
example: Example : A non-profit global-standardization member organization that shall promote the development of open specifications to be used as standards for enabling the interoperability of data, software and related matters

name: CFIHOS code equivalent value
definition: The code, assigned in the coding source, to the object that is equivalent to the CFIHOS object

name: discipline document type short code
definition: At alternate way of identifying uniquely a combination of discipline and document type
note / comment: This attribute is calculated as a concatenetion of the discipline code and the document type short code

name: discipline description
definition: A description of what the discipline covers
example: Example : Health is the discipline concerned with protecting the health and welfare of people engaged in work or employment.

name: document type description
definition: The full description of what the document type covers
example: Example : Includes FAT and non-FAT (Factory Acceptance Test) procedures; Also see Acceptance Test Report for definitions.

name: document type classification code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies a document type classification

name: document type classification description
definition: A description of what the document type classification represents

name: asset type description
definition: A description of what the asset type represents

name: documentation representation type description
definition: A description of what the document representation type is or represents

name: document format code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies a format that a document can take

name: document format description
definition: A description of what the document format represents

name: document review type description
definition: A description of what the document review type represents
example: Example : The review type is not specified.

name: document retention period code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the period during which documents of a given type and related to a given discipline must be retained

name: document retention period description
definition: A description of what the document retention period represents
example: Example : To be kept as long as the asset is not retired

name: requirement standard source code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the source of the requirement

name: requirement standard source name
definition: A description of what the source of the requirement represents
example: Example : Identified during review by the core team

name: discipline document type description
definition: A description of what the combination of the discipline and document type represents / is used for
example: Example : Includes P&IDs and Utility Engineering Flow Schemes UEFS.

name: source standard description
definition: The description of what that reference standard represents or covers

name: source standard still to be completed indicator
definition: An indicator whether the source standard is complete, or if it is still evolving and needs to be completed

name: tag or equipment class synonym name
definition: A name that can be used as synonym for a tag or equipment class

name: life cycle activity class code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies a class of activities in the life cycle of a capital asset

name: life cycle activity class description
definition: A description of what the life cycle activity class represents
example: Example : The  activity of bringing in a state where readiness for active service is warranted

name: application condition code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies an application condition

name: application condition description
definition: A description of what the application condition represents

name: unit of measure dimension code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the unit of measure dimension

name: unit of measure dimension name
definition: The name of the unit of measure dimension

name: property data type length
definition: The maximum length that a property value may have in a pick list

name: unit of measure code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the unit of measure
note / comment: The coding of units of measure will be based on UN/ECE codes. The reasons for this is that 1) ISO does not, in 2018, have codes for units of measure, and 2) UN/ECE is the standard used in EDI transactions, i.e. to exchange transaction information electronically between parties

name: unit of measure name
definition: The name by which is designated the unit of measure

name: unit of measure symbol
definition: The symbol that usually used to represent the unit of measure

name: measurement system code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the measurement system

name: measurement system name
definition: The name under which the measurement system is known

name: reason for deviating from standard unit of measure
definition: The reason why the unit of measure as prescribed by the source standard as not been used to report the tag property value

name: unit of measure synonym name
definition: The name by which a unit of measure can alternatively be designated

name: source standard section
definition: The section of the source standard in which the property is documented

name: property name in source standard
definition: The name of the property in the source standard document

name: property relevant for equipment indicator
definition: An indicator whether the property should be provided for a given equipment
note / comment: It is important to distinguish the properties that should be provided by the EPC for an equipment, but e.g. not for a model. For instance, the color of a car is relevant for a given instance of a car, but not for the model.

name: property relevant for model / part indicator
definition: An indication whether the property must by provided by the EPC (or the manufacturer) for a given model
note / comment: Some properties should be reported for the models / parts associated with an equipment class, some for the equipment associated with the equipment class. Those are two separate pieces of data.

name: tag property value
definition: The value of the property for that tag
note / comment: The data type of that value must be aligned with the data type of the property. Moreover, if the property is numeric, it should be qualified by a unit of measure. If the property is not numeric, and has a pick list associated with the tag property value must be one of the entries in the set of pick list values.

name: model part property value
definition: The value of the property for that model part
note / comment: The value of the property should be qualified by a unit of measure if it is numeric. If it is not numeric, and that the property is associated with a pick list, then the value of the property should be one of the valid pick list values.

name: equipment property value
definition: The value of that property for this equipment.
note / comment: Id the value is numeric it should be qualified by a unit of measure. If it is not numeric, and the property is associated with a pick list, then it should be a valid entry from that pick list set of values.

name: data type name
definition: A description of what the data type code represents

name: sending company name
definition: The name of the company who has sent the transmittal

name: referenced document number
definition: The unique identifier for the document according to the Owner/Operator document numbering scheme

name: referenced document revision code
definition: A code used to identify the content of a document at a certain point in time

name: storage media description
definition: A description of what the storage media represents

name: tag or equipment class name
definition: The full name of the tag or equipment class

name: parent tag or equipment class name
definition: The full name of the tag or equipment class
note / comment: The parent is actually mandatory for all classes, except the one at the top of the hierarchy

name: tag or equipment class definition
definition: A definition of what the tag or equipment class is
example: Example : A panel containing full set of indicating devices and remote control units required for operation of a system or part of it

name: tag class indicator
definition: An indication that the tag or equipment class is considered as a tag class

name: equipment class indicator
definition: An indication that the tag or equipment class is considered as an equipment class

name: tag or equipment class existence reason description
definition: An explanation of why the tag or equipment class was created / needed
note / comment: RDL management attribute, not shared contractually with contractors

name: property is relevant for tag indicator
definition: An indication that the property is relevant for tags associated with the class

name: discipline document type required for tag indicator
definition: An indication that the discipline document type is required for tags associated with this class

name: discipline document type required for model part indicator
definition: An indication that the discipline document type is required for models or parts associated with this class

name: discipline document type required for equipment indicator
definition: An indication that the discipline document type is required for equipment associated with this class

name: tag or equipment class relationship reason for mapping
definition: The underlying reason why the tag class and the equipment class are related

name: source standard document and data requirement number
definition: A number, assigned sequentially, to associate the VDDR to the engineering standard

name: source standard document and data requirement title
definition: The title, as spelled in the engineering standard, of the VDDR
example: Example :  Anticipated thermal movements for major connections

name: source standard document and data requirement typical deliverable
definition: A short description of the information deliverable that would typically include this document and data requirement
note / comment: This field uses CFIHOS naming as much as possible, and is aligned as much as possible withthe JIP33 library of typical deliverable.
example: Example :  Anticipated thermal movements for major connections

name: source standard document and data requirement description
definition: A precise description, as documented in the engineering standard, of the VDDR in term of what the content of the document shall be
example: Example : The seal cross-sectional drawing shall include at least the following information:a) all seal components related to the order as well as pump components realted to the seal.b) dimensions to properly verify the seal setting position.c) Pu

name: engineering standard source chapter
definition: The chapter of the engineering standard from which originates the VDDR

name: default submit at proposal indicator
definition: An indicator whether documents having for content this VDDR shall be submitted by the Vendor during the ITT process. or not

name: default submit for review indicator
definition: An indication whether documents having for content this requirement shall be submitted  by the vendor for review or not

name: default submit at delivery indicator
definition: An indicator whether document having for content this VDDR shall be delivered by the Vendor at the same time as the delivery of the material or service.

name: default issue for review number of weeks
definition: The number of weeks that, by default, should  be used, by the vendor, vs the reference date, to provide documents containing this VDDR for review

name: default issue for review reference date
definition: A code that uniquely identifies a document submission reference date

name: default issue for approval number of weeks
definition: The number of weeks that, by default, should  be used, by the vendor, vs the reference date, to provide documents containing this VDDR for approval

name: default issue for approval reference date
definition: A code that uniquely identifies a document submission reference date

name: default for information number of weeks
definition: The number of weeks that, by default, should  be used, by the vendor, vs the reference date, to provide documents containing this VDDR for final issue

name: default for information reference date
definition: A code that uniquely identifies a document submission reference date

name: default required handover status code
definition: The required status of the document at handover time

name: default required translation indicator
definition: An indication whether a document needs to be translated (for regulatory reason or operation reasons) or not

name: source standard document and data requirement comment
definition: A remark that the originator of the document and data requirement for this source standard wanted to capture

name: application condition group code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies a group of application conditions

name: application condition group description
definition: A description of what the application condition group represents

name: comparison operator code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the comparison operator

name: comparison operator name
definition: The description of what the comparison operator represents

name: application condition value
definition: The value that a condition must have to require the specification of a property for a tag or equipment class

name: document and data requirement type code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the type of document and data requirement

name: document and data requirement type description
definition: A description of what the document and data requirement represents
example: Example : Information generated during the design activity that has to be approved and reviewed by the purchaser.

name: document and data requirement group code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the group to which a vendor document and data requirement belongs

name: document and data requirement group name
definition: A description of what that group of vendor document and data requirements represents
example: Examples : Technical Information Deliverables, Contract Management Information Deliverables

name: source standard document and data requirement inclusion indicator
definition: An indication whether a source standard document and data requirement should be included or excluded of the condition is met

name: event type code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the type of event of interest to CFIHOS

name: event type name
definition: The name, or description of the type of event

name: submission reference date code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies a document submission reference date

name: submission reference date name
definition: The name used to designate the submission reference date

name: submission reference is after event type indicator
definition: An indicator whether the submission reference date is after the even type or not

name: purchase order item number
definition: A code that uniquely identifies an item in a purchase order through which this equipment was acquired

name: purchase order item description
definition: A description of what is being purchased through this item

name: purchase order item initial expected delivery date
definition: The date, initially estimated, for the delivery of the purchase order item

name: purchase order item latest revised delivery date
definition: The latest revised date for the delivery of the purchase order item

name: purchase order item quantity
definition: The quantity of what is purchased in this order item

name: planned final revision date
definition: The date at which the final revision of the document is expected to be issued

name: actual final revision date
definition: The date at which the final revision of the document was actually issued

name: vendor document update description
definition: A description of what has changed in the vendor document  since its previous document index transmission

name: purchase order vendor document and data requirement number
definition: A number that uniquely identifies a document and data requirement of a given standard source, in a given purchase order item

name: submit at proposal indicator
definition: An indication whether documents having for content this VDDR shall be submitted by the Vendor during the ITT process or not

name: submit for review indicator
definition: An indication whether documents having for content this VDDR shall be submitted by the Vendor for review or not

name: submit at delivery indicator
definition: An indication whether document having for content this VDDR shall be delivered by the Vendor at the same time as the delivery of the material or service or not

name: date required for information sharing
definition: The date agreed with the vendor by which information about this document and data requirement should be shared

name: date required for final review
definition: The date agreed with the vendor by which a final review version of  this document and data requirement should be available

name: date required for approval
definition: The date agreed with the vendor by which an approved version of  this document and data requirement should be available

name: translation required indicator
definition: An indication whether a document needs to be translated (for regulatory reason or operation reasons), or not

name: purchaser comment
definition: A comment made by the purchase issuer about this VDDR in this purchase order item

name: contractor comment
definition: A comment made by the contractor about this VDDR in this purchase order item

name: vendor comment
definition: A comment made by the vendor about this VDDR in this purchase order item

name: purchase order item event original estimated date
definition: The date at which the expected event was initially estimated to take place

name: purchase order item event latest revised date
definition: The latest revised date at which the expected event is estimated to take place.

name: process class name
definition: The name by which a process class is uniquely identified

name: process class definition
definition: A definition of what the process class represents
example: Example : The action of placing something in a storage medium.

name: process activity code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the process / activity

name: parent process activity code
definition: The process / activity the current process is part of, or is a step of

name: process activity description
definition: A description of what action is performed by this process activity
example: Example : heating the crude provided by the stream MS_04 and pass it to the stream MS_06

name: process design property value
definition: The value, qualified by a unit of measure, that the property must have to meet the design needs of the process

name: stream class code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the class of stream

name: stream class description
definition: A description of what the stream is transporting, transforming or storing

name: process stream code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies a process stream

name: process stream description
definition: A description of what the process stream is transporting / transforming or storing, and how it fits within the process flow diagram
example: Example : Move of crude from Tank TK01 to process Pumping P_123

name: output of process activity code
definition: The process from which the stream originates

name: input of process activity code
definition: The process to which the stream is delivering its material, energy, or information

name: process stream property value
definition: The value that the property must take to allow for proper functioning of the stream

name: tag property margin ratio
definition: The total margin that has been applied on the value of the tag property, compared to what was evaluated as the process stream property

name: parent stream class code
definition: The stream class that is a super type of this stream class

name: process case number
definition: The unique identifier of a process case

name: process case description
definition: The description of the process case being analysed

name: process stream property value in case
definition: The value that the property has taken in the process stream case

name: process property value in case
definition: The value that a property has taken in the process case

name: handover event name
definition: A name that uniquely identifies the event during which handover of information is taking place

name: handover event description
definition: The description of what the handover event represents
example: Example : Project milestone for information handover for the start of the detailed engineering activity

name: handover event reporting sequence number
definition: A sequence number, used to determine in which order the handover phases should be reported

name: native file delivery timing code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the timing for the native file delivery

name: native file delivery timing description
definition: A description of what the timing of the native file delivery represents.
example: Example : The native file should be delivered during project

name: native document format
definition: The native format that the document should have

name: authenticated record format
definition: The format under which the authenticated record is provided

name: deliverable format code
definition: A code that uniquely identifies the format of the deliverable

name: deliverable format description
definition: A description of what the deliverable format represents
